Title: Sharpest Beak
Description: SharpestBeak's concept is that players write their own logic of controlling chicken units so that enemy's units are eliminated.
HomeWiki:
Project Has Moved

The project has moved to BitBucket: https://bitbucket.org/HarinezumiSama/sharpestbeak

Overview

SharpestBeak's concept is that players write their own logic of controlling chicken units so that enemy's units are eliminated.

Credits

Initial idea by Oleg Yegorov, Sergei Olshanetskii, and Vitalii Maklai. Development and further ideas - by Vitalii Maklai (aka VMcL aka HarinezumiSama). The platform used for development is Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2. The logic can be implemented using any .NET 4.5.2+ compliant language.
